overview: The Dells -- a rhythm and blues act that has showcased the same lineup of singers since the 1960s -- deliver a memorable live concert in New York City in 2006 honoring their classic R&B sound. A set list of favorites includes "Oh, What a Night," "Stay in My Corner" and "A Heart Is a House for Love," a song released as part of the soundtrack for The Five Heartbeats, a 1991 film based loosely on the group's experiences.
title: The Dells: Live from NYC
